column2: The Week in Pictures: Knife & Razor Edition
column5: So have I got this right? This was the week we learned that knife-fighting is just a typical rite of passage for youth today and the police should just stay out of it. Occam’s Razor would suggest this is idiocy but I guess a knife beats even Occam’s blade though I am surprised some nitwit hasn’t suggested that police officers deploy rocks since rocks beat scissors and I’m sure there’s a pusillanimous postmodern paper explaining the transitive properties of rocks to knives in the Journal of Woke Policing.                             Our government at work.             Headlines of the week:                   Apparently not real. But how can you tell these days?                                         And finally. . .  Commenters who employ what we deem extreme vulgarity in a comment — “s***” “f***” “a*******” or one of their many variants — will be banned without further notice.  “Arise and take our stand for freedom as in the olden time.”

column1: Winston Churchill “Proclaim Liberty throughout All the land unto All the Inhabitants Thereof.”
